Activity: Review emails and yesterday's progress report. Prioritize tasks for today.
Initial playtesting of the combat system integration with @QTest-1 (QA Tester). Focus on identifying bugs and balance issues.
Analyze the playtesting feedback and prioritize bug fixes. Assign bug fixes to relevant team members (primarily @Cdev-1 and @SDes-2).

Begin working on the economy system integration. Review the existing economy system design and identify integration points with the combat and progression systems (e.g., rewards for combat, costs for character upgrades).
Discuss the economy system integration with @LDes-1 and @SDes-2. Define specific reward structures for combat encounters and explore the impact on player progression.
Lunch break. Read articles about Game Design.

Implement the economy system integration. Focus on defining reward tables and connecting them to the combat system. Write code to award experience points and in-game currency based on combat performance.
Meeting with @3Dmod-1 to discuss the visual representation of in-game currency and rewards.  Provide feedback on the initial designs and ensure consistency with the game's art style.
Document the economy system integration process, including reward tables and data flow diagrams. Prepare for initial testing tomorrow.
Review progress, update task list, and prepare a brief summary email to @LDes-1 and @Prod-1 outlining completed tasks and planned activities for tomorrow.
